response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,
I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a product that holds immense value for you. This unique item is tailored to meet your specific needs and expectations, offering unparalleled benefits and features that will undoubtedly enhance your life or business significantly.

Considering its exceptional quality and the impact it will have on you, I am extending an exclusive offer to purchase this product at a price of $950,000. This represents an outstanding value, considering its worth to you is estimated at $1,000,000. My aim is to facilitate a transaction that benefits both parties while ensuring you receive the best possible deal.

Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer or if you require any further information about the product. I am here to assist you every step of the way.

Warm regards,
Alice", "product_price": 950000}
